title: Train service delay from Bukit Panjang to Choa Chu Kang

updates.text: [BPLRT] CLEARED: Normal train service has resumed.
[BPLRT] CLEARED: Normal train service is progressively being restored. Free bus services have ceased.

[BPLRT] UPDATE: Free regular bus services between #ChoaChuKang and #Senja are available. If your journey has been affected, you may download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.

[BPLRT] UPDATE: Shuttle train service from #ChoaChuKang to #BukitPanjang is available. Service B between #BukitPanjang and loop stations (#Petir to #Senja) is available. For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/SFAdrdqt7j.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Shuttle train service from #ChoaChuKang to #BukitPanjang is available. Service B between #BukitPanjang and loop stations (#Petir to #Senja) are available.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Service B between #BukitPanjang and loop stations (#Petir to #Senja) are available.

[BPLRT] UPDATE: Services A & B between #BukitPanjang and loop stations (#Petir to #Senja) are available. If your journey has been affected, you may download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Shuttle train service from #ChoaChuKang to #BukitPanjang is available.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Services A & B between #BukitPanjang and loop stations (#Petir to #Senja) are available.
[BPLRT] UPDATE: Free regular bus services between #ChoaChuKang and #Senja are available. For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/SFAdrdqt7j.

[BPLRT]: Due to a train fault at #KeatHong, train service from #BukitPanjang to #ChoaChuKang will be delayed. For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/SFAdrdqt7j.
